name: Fly over my town
description:
GAMEPLAY


CONTROLS

MOVE

ATTACK - survive mode

Keep position, Rotate and Shoot

Keyboard

- Move: AWSD
- Enable/Disable attack mode: Space
- Pause: ESC

Controller PS4

- Move: Joystick
- Enable/Disable attack mode: Square
- Pause: Option
